key.name: 母鸡开发者测试
key.uiDescription: 为开发者测试而制作的临时副本。

key.name: [活动]卡特拉姆斯下层地带/上层地带
幻影之蓝影洞穴[普通/困难]
幻影之荷鲁斯巢穴[普通/困难]
布莱克缤游乐场[普通/困难]
Temple of Immortals
key.uiDescription:
The immortal $npcName:23090005$ cannot be destroyed, but he can be contained for a time. On the edge of $map:02000200$, at the $map:02000037$, a hero must rise to combat the undying $npc:23090005$!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font>

key.name: 不灭神殿
key.uiDescription: 传说中拥有不死之身的<font color='#00aaef'>$npc:23090005$</font>……人类只能使这邪恶怪物陷入沉睡，却无法彻底消灭它。它就在位于$map:02000200$尽头的$map:02000037$！究竟谁能在此地打倒<font color='#00aaef'>$npc:23090005$</font>！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Temple of Immortals
key.uiDescription:
The immortal $npcName:23090005$ cannot be destroyed, but he can be contained for a time. On the edge of $map:02000200$, at $map:02000037$, a hero must rise to combat the undying $npc:23090005$!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 不灭神殿
key.uiDescription: 传说中拥有不死之身的<font color='#00aaef'>$npc:23090005$</font>……人类只能使这邪恶怪物陷入沉睡，却无法彻底消灭它。它就在位于$map:02000200$尽头的$map:02000037$！！究竟谁能在此地打倒<font color='#00aaef'>$npc:23090005$</font>呢！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Last of the Vayar
key.uiDescription: The ancients took the holy Vayar Mountain as their sanctuary and planted the stones of faith there, giving rise to the giant golems that would protect the sacred area. With their civilization in ruins, most of the Vayar have gone into hiding... but one has returned, at Bastei Peak.

key.name: Blueshade Cave
key.uiDescription: The warm-hearted Shoo from Snowfield took a poison arrow right to the heart, and froze their ticker with an ice fragment until they could get help. This had the unfortunate side effect of turning Shoo into a ravenous monster who has been wreaking havoc with their friend Booboo.

key.name: Warbot Rebellion
key.uiDescription: The MK 52 series of war robots was designed in secret by the brilliant Dr. Kartronic for unknown purposes. Surely his intentions were good, but now they appear to have gotten out of hand. Watch out for the Beta version, for its combat potential is significantly higher than that of the Alpha.

key.name: Horus's Nest
key.uiDescription: Once long ago, the top of $map:02000009$ was a grand forest. It was here that Horus made a nest... and here Horus plotted revenge against humans hunting eggs. Now the forest is thinned, and the nest is exposed. Who will take the fight to Horus?

key.name: Forgotten Vayar
key.uiDescription: The ancient civilization of the holy Vayar Mountains is no more, but their legacy can be found in the strangest places. Such as in an icy cave on a secluded beach... That is where the terrible $npcName:23000006$ has awakened.

key.name: Forest of Chaos
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23000025$ sows chaos to pave the way for his dark masters. This beast is the source of a potent curse that grips this once-peaceful forest.

key.name: Demon Tree
key.uiDescription:
A dormant demon tree has begun controlling villagers, forcing them to worship statues the tree has imbued with pure evil. If this is allowed to continue, such evil will eventually conquer all of humanity.
<font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot instant revive if you have Soul's Respite.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot use Mesos to instant revive.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Shadow Altar
key.uiDescription:
The $map:02000213$ is the base of the mighty $npcName:23000007$, who uses it to bring his army into Maple World. Any who would challenge $npcName:23000007$ must survive his corrupting darkness.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 影子军团祭坛
key.uiDescription: 据说$map:02000213$是一处“召唤地”，$npc:23000007$不断在这里召唤出影子军团，并利用黑暗力量强化他们。要靠近这里，需要冒着身心被这强劲黑暗力量支配的危险。那么，会有意志足够坚定的英雄来阻止$npc:23000007$吗？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Shadow Altar
key.uiDescription: The $map:02000213$ is the base of the mighty $npcName:23000007$, who uses it to bring his army into Maple World. Any who would challenge $npcName:23000007$ must survive his corrupting darkness.

key.name: Tronix Bunker
key.uiDescription: The most powerful of Dr. Kartronic's war robots was considered a failure because it could not be controlled. No one knows when $npcName:23000056$ will finally escape their prison in $map:02000232$ and destroy everything.

key.name: Moonlight Fortress
key.uiDescription: For ages, boats have occasionally gone missing in the middle of the ocean. They leave no remains, either, adding to the mystery. Somewhere out there, a phantom pirate ship stalks the waves. What could they be doing out there?

key.name: Moonlight Fortress
key.uiDescription:
For ages, boats have occasionally gone missing in the middle of the ocean. They leave no remains, adding to the mystery. Somewhere out there, a phantom pirate ship stalks the waves. What could it be doing out there?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 月光船长要塞
key.uiDescription: 从很久以前开始，就常发生大小船只谜一般消失在海中的事件，不仅船员全部下落不明，就连船的残骸都无法找到！有传言说是怒海中神出鬼没的幽灵海盗团干的。这群冷酷无情的海上暴徒究竟是什么来头？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Ludibrium Clock Tower
key.uiDescription: The biggest clock tower in Maple World has stopped ticking. What's going on inside the tower?

key.name: Ludibrium Clock Tower
key.uiDescription:
The biggest and grandest clock tower in Maple World has stopped ticking. Could something be wrong inside the tower?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Hemokan the Fallen
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23000039$ has awakened from its transformation within the Shadow Seeds sowed by corrupted fairies. As the vile energies gather, $npcName:23000039$ grows stronger and more enraged. Who will be the one to face the beast and lay it to rest? Protect $map:02000023$ from the savage $npc:23000039$!

key.name: Burning Pamokan
key.uiDescription: Strange fires have been sparked all over Victoria Island, and their source appears to be $map:02000079$! The harbinger of flames, $npcName:23000041$, has emerged from the lava and returned to terrorize the populace. Can you drive back $npcName:23000041$ and stop the spreading flames?

key.name: The Fire Dragon
key.uiDescription:
The dark fairfolk have driven $npcName:23100011$ mad, and he's torching everything in sight. Who will face the flames of $map:02000311$ and end the menace?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Revivals are limited in safe zones.</font>

key.name: 黑炎龙兽
key.uiDescription: 吸收了堕落妖精们的黑暗气息，$npc:23100011$从蛋里孵化出来。他喷着巨大的火球，将周围的一切烧成了灰烬 $map:02000311$就像火焰地狱！而踏着烈焰挑战$npc:23100011$的英雄，将会是谁呢？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Waterbug Park
key.uiDescription: Due to the outrageous insect infestation, $map:02010019$ has been closed to the public. According to $npcName:11001342$, the ones that appeared with the insect captain were acting like soldiers searching for something... For now, sweep out the insects so $map:02010019$ can reopen for business!

key.name: Lubelisk
key.uiDescription:
Lubelisk, the shrine of the fallen Merjit kingdom, exudes a powerful darkness. What could Varrekant, a visitor from the other world, want from there? Recover the stolen Lumenstone and defeat Varrekant!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 路贝里斯克
key.uiDescription: 能够感觉到强大黑暗气息的已灭亡的麦吉塔王国神殿——路贝里斯克。这个地方原本是为了供奉神龙神而建立的，巴尔坎来这里到底想得到什么呢……夺回被抢走的龙石，阻止巴尔坎的野心吧。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Lubelisk
key.uiDescription:
Lubelisk, the shrine of the fallen Merjit kingdom, exudes a powerful darkness. What could Varrekant, a visitor from the other world, want from there? Recover the stolen Lumenstone and defeat Varrekant!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 路贝里斯克
key.uiDescription: 散发出强力黑暗气息的古麦吉塔王国神殿-路贝里斯克。来自异界的巴尔坎，到这个原本为了供奉神龙而建的地方来干什么呢……夺回被抢走的龙石，阻止巴尔坎的野心吧！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Rune Temple
key.uiDescription:
Deep within this divine sanctuary, the Rune Shamans hid a magic weapon of untold power, the Runicta. Its guardian sits beside it in an enchanted sleep, awaiting a disciple of the runic arts capable of wielding the weapon's incredible power. Will you awaken the ancient titan?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 符文圣殿
key.uiDescription: 在庄严的圣殿深处，终极魔力机器——罗尼塔静静地沉睡着！自从被古代符文咒术师藏起来之后，它一直在等待，等待着那个可以驾驭这种力量的符文后裔，那个令它睁开双眼的人…… \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Rune Temple
key.uiDescription:
Deep within this divine sanctuary, the Rune Shamans hid a magic weapon of untold power, the Runicta. Its guardian sits beside it in an enchanted sleep, awaiting a disciple of the runic arts capable of wielding the weapon's incredible power. Will you awaken the ancient titan?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 符文圣殿
key.uiDescription: 终极魔力机器——罗尼塔被古代符文咒术师们藏在了庄严的圣殿深处！一直沉睡着的它，在安静等待着能够承受它力量的符文后裔……究竟谁能够唤醒它呢？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: BeyondLink Tris
key.uiDescription:
$npcName:23000081$ is the deceitful director of a humanoid engineering project! His dangerous research is nearing its final stage, culminating in the birth of a new army to rival the Penumbran Host! Who will defeat $npcName:23000081$ and stop his research once and for all?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 超链接之树
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23000081$以钻研类人机器人工学为幌子，正在主导一项危险的研究！这将使足以匹敌影子军团的新军团诞生……谁能打倒<font color='#00aaef'>$npcName:23000081$</font>，阻止他的研究！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: BeyondLink Tris
key.uiDescription:
$npcName:23000081$ is the deceitful director of a humanoid engineering project! His dangerous research is nearing its final stage, culminating in the birth of a new army to rival the Penumbran Host! Who will defeat $npcName:23000081$ and stop his research once and for all?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 超链接之树
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23000081$打着钻研类人机器人工学的幌子，正在主导一项危险的研究！足以匹敌影子军团的新军团即将诞生……谁能打倒<font color='#00aaef'>$npcName:23000081$</font>，阻止他的研究呢！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: The Song of the Oracle
key.uiDescription:
The siren sisters who dwell upon $map:02000391$ are said to be as beautiful as their song. But the sudden influx of unwelcome guests has filled them with rage. Placate them and learn what they know of the message coming from the ocean.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 神女的歌声
key.uiDescription: 拥有见之难忘的美貌和优美声音的海妖姐妹一直生活在$map:02000391$。但是，突然冒出的不速之客扰乱了这里的平静……让愤怒的海妖姐妹冷静下来，并听听大海的故事吧。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Guardian of the Seas
key.uiDescription:
The reclusive guardian's call reverberates from the depths of the ocean. Seized by a dark rage, he bellows in warning. What exactly is he trying to tell the humans above?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 大海的守护神
key.uiDescription: 从大海深处传来的巨大鸣响。久未出现在世人面前的大洋守护者被黑暗的愤怒所裹挟，他极其认真地向世人发出警告。他到底要向人类传达什么呢？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Icethorn Ridge
key.uiDescription:
It is said that somewhere at the foot of $map:02000381$, a secret path to a lost kingdom awaits. The path only appears to a few, and when it does, an icy wail travels along it, frightening away any who might dare enter. Who or what could be hiding within?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 风雪山脉
key.uiDescription: 据说在风雪肆虐的山脚某处，隐藏着一条道路， 通过这条道路，能触及消失王国的秘密。据说，那个地方只会对获得许可的人敞开，不知从何时开始，从那里传来了森冷的鸣泣之声……那里到底埋藏着怎样的秘密呢？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Malevolent Manor
key.uiDescription:
A large, eerie manor has been discovered north of the Shadow Gate. Though it seems deserted, a malevolent aura emanates from within. What atrocity must have happened within, oh so long ago?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 怨念豪宅
key.uiDescription: 我在阴影之门的一角发现了一栋高大的住宅。在这人迹罕至的地方能感觉到充满恶意的邪念。过去在这座住宅里发生过什么事？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Madrakan Ramparts
key.uiDescription:
The invasion of Madrakan, Madria's fortress, has begun! The Maple Alliance has it surrounded, but its thick castle walls are preventing entry. The only way to conquer Madrakan now is to somehow storm the gateway, and only true heroes could be up to the task.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 马德拉坎城墙
key.uiDescription: 针对莉莉丝的要塞“马德拉坎”的攻城战终于拉开了帷幕。尽管冒险岛联盟集结所有力量包围要塞，发动了进攻，但马德拉坎坚固的城墙牢牢地拦住了联盟的进军。攻打马德拉坎的第一道关卡，胜败的关键就在于众勇士们。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: Madrakan's Heart
key.uiDescription:
It only takes one small crack to compromise the strongest of armor. So too it is with a fortress. The Maple Alliance has put together an elite team to invade Madrakan and put an end to a threat that has long plagued the alliance.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 潜入马德拉坎
key.uiDescription: 俗话说千里之堤毁于蚁穴。冒险岛联盟派出由少数精锐人员组成的渗透组，试图潜入马德拉坎内部。隐秘又伟大的渗透作战，克服联盟面临的危机吧！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: L1: Apeullela Outback
key.uiDescription:
To experience the virtual realities built on the Xenon System, you must first access a link. Speak to Dr. $npcName:11003529$ for information.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: L2: Rainbow Slime Factory
key.uiDescription:
To experience the virtual realities built on the Xenon System, you must first access a link. Speak to Dr. $npcName:11003529$ for information.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.uiDescription:
To experience the virtual realities built on the Xenon System, you must first access a link. Speak to Dr. $npcName:11003529$ for information.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: L4: Ice Beast's Den
key.uiDescription:
To experience the virtual realities built on the Xenon System, you must first access a link. Speak to Dr. $npcName:11003529$ for information.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.uiDescription:
To experience the virtual realities built on the Xenon System, you must first access a link. Speak to Dr. $npcName:11003529$ for information.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.uiDescription: 虚拟现实体验

key.name: Golden Tower 7F
key.uiDescription: Black market dealers from the Land of Darkness have hit the jackpot, breaking through the tight regulations that control trade in Maple World. Get into their hideout and learn their illicit secrets!

key.name: Golden Tower 4F
key.uiDescription: Black market dealers from the Land of Darkness have hit the jackpot, breaking through the tight regulations that control trade in Maple World. Get into their hideout and learn their illicit secrets!

key.name: Golden Tower Elevator
key.uiDescription: Black market dealers from the Land of Darkness have hit the jackpot, breaking through the tight regulations that control trade in Maple World. Get into their hideout and learn their illicit secrets!

key.name: Cusp of Life
key.uiDescription: The great barrier of life that maintains order in the mortal world is under siege. Someone seeks to claim the Green Lapenta of Life, and is willing to destroy the barrier entirely to do it. Fight to protect the source of all life!

key.name: The Poison Cave
key.uiDescription: The naturally-occurring poisons of the Land of Darkness are spilling over into Maple World! This isn't an accident... someone is trying to poison the whole world. They're trying to stay out of sight, but an intrepid hero might be able to track them down.

key.name: Palace Undercroft
key.uiDescription: Within the dark halls beneath Tria Palace, a piercing scream rings out. What awaits you in the Palace Undercroft?

key.name: Cherry Blossom Forest
key.uiDescription: The beautiful Cherry Blossom Forest is home of the boroboros, or fairfolk dwarves. Over the years, they've grown more and more reclusive, until at last they were forgotten. Now, a cry for help can be heard from these mysterious reaches. What could have happened to them?

key.name: Ludible Time Hall
key.uiDescription: $map:02000298$ is the secret research station founded to study temporal mechanics and develop a functioning a time machine on behalf of the $map:02000309$ in $map:02000270$. Everything was going fine, until the place was besieged by unknown assailants.

key.name: Katramus Depths
key.uiDescription: The Cruel Tower of Katramus is the greatest slaver's camp in the Land of Darkness. Join the Lumina Liberation Army and strike a blow for freedom!

key.name: Katramus Heights
key.uiDescription: The Cruel Tower of Katramus is the greatest slaver's camp in the Land of Darkness. Join the Lumina Liberation Army and strike a blow for freedom!

key.name: Root of Darkness
key.uiDescription: There's a legend in the Land of Darkness about the seed of darkness, an object which can birth new descendants of the demon king! Once the seed sprouts and the roots are set, it is said that darkness will engulf the world...

key.name: Casa de Luna
key.uiDescription: Once the moon lost its light, an unknown shadow fell over $map:02010047$. Taking advantage of the darkness, an ancient shaman has plotted to grow his power and threaten the world!

key.name: Coldwind Cave
key.uiDescription: The waterway that crosses the village starts underground. The villagers give offerings to the underground tunnel creature, out of fear that the waterway will be shut off. Who could do such a thing?

key.name: Blaknov No. 1
key.uiDescription: An unruly mob has seized Blackstar's main transportation, the Blaknov! $npcName:11001460$'s suborindate $npcName:11003124$ is trapped on the train and needs to be rescued. Why was the Blaknov taken in the first place? Stop the runaway train and find out!

key.name: Lingering Darkness
key.uiDescription: You thought it was over. You thought his treachery and evil had been ended. But the seed of darkness in his heart would not let him rest. When will this darkness truly end?

key.name: Blaknov No. 2
key.uiDescription: An unruly mob has seized Blackstar's main transportation, the Blaknov! $npcName:11001460$'s suborindate $npcName:11003125$ is trapped on the train and needs to be rescued. Why was the Blaknov taken in the first place? Stop the runaway train and find out!

key.name: Sanctum of the Sage
key.uiDescription: The villainous $npcName:11001778$ is after the Animus Lamp, the artifact of a secret order of martial artist beastfolk. Join $npcName:24002718$ and $npcName:24002719$ as they fight to expel evil from their order's sanctum and restore light to the darkness.

key.name: Muros Studio
key.uiDescription: It's the first day of filming, but the big star is nowhere to be found! Time is short, and the director is desparate to find a replacement actor. This is your chance to make your TV debut, and take a shot at stardom! Will you step into the spotlight?

key.name: Guardian of the Seas
key.uiDescription: The reclusive guardian's call reverberates from the depths of the ocean. Seized by a dark rage, he bellows in warning. What exactly is he trying to tell the humans above?

key.name: The Song of the Oracle
key.uiDescription: The siren sisters who dwell upon $map:02000391$ are said to be as beautiful as their song. But the sudden influx of unwelcome guests has filled them with rage. Placate them and learn what they know of the message coming from the ocean.

key.name: Madrakan's Heart
key.uiDescription: A small crack can grow and eventually lead to the downfall of an impenetrable fortress. The Maple Alliance has put together an elite team to invade Madrakan. It's time to end one of the greatest threats to the Maple Alliance!

key.name: Madrakan Ramparts
key.uiDescription: The siege of Madrakan, the stronghold of Madria, has begun! The Maple Alliance has it surrounded, but its thick castle walls are preventing entry. The only way to conquer Madrakan now is to somehow storm the gateway—a task for a true hero!

key.name: Chateau of Grief
key.uiDescription: A huge manor has been discovered at one corner of the Shadow Gate. It's deserted, but there's a malicious aura all around it. What happened in there, so long ago?

key.name: Icethorn Ridge
key.uiDescription: It is said that at the foot of a mountain, hidden within a raging snowstorm, a secret path to a lost kingdom awaits. The path appears to precious few, and those who see it are frightened away by a terrifying cry. Who or what could be hiding there?

key.name: Normal Frostpillar Temple
key.uiDescription:
A temple to a lost kingdom. A dark shadow that stands watch. No adventurer has ever survived long enough to uncover the temple's secrets...
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 冰霜神殿[普通]
key.uiDescription: 寒气四溢的神殿中埋藏着消失王国的秘宝。 无人能接近那里，有暗影从里面钻出来………… 殿中回响着充满了愤怒的低沉呼吸声。入侵者都将受到相应的惩罚。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>安全场所复活次数受限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[该场所仅限10人参加游戏]</font>

key.name: Normal Madrakan Spire
key.uiDescription:
The Maple Alliance has successfully marched into the Madrakan Spire, where everyone now awaits the final showdown against Madria. To clench victory, the Maple Alliance is in dire need of elite heroes. Gather the best fighters you can and put an end to Madrakan!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 马德拉坎尖塔[普通]
key.uiDescription: 冒险岛联盟已成功进军至马德拉坎尖塔。现在即将和莉莉丝、堕落神龙夜蚀进行最终决战，在这种时候，联盟尤其需要精锐勇士的帮助。召集最精锐的勇士，为马德拉坎之战画上句号吧！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>安全场所复活次数受限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[该场所仅限10人参加游戏]</font>

key.name: Normal Rock 'n' Rollin' Pink Bean
key.uiDescription:
An unidentifiable, bizarre creature has appeared in the Temple of Time. Protect the temple.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 异界之域[普通]
key.uiDescription: 时光神殿里出现了来历不明的奇怪生物。必须对抗异界生物，保卫神殿。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Frostpillar Temple
key.uiDescription:
A temple to a lost kingdom. A dark shadow that stands watch. No adventurer has ever survived long enough to uncover the temple's secrets...
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 冰霜神殿
key.uiDescription: 寒气充盈的神殿中，隐藏着消失王国的秘宝。在那无人能靠近的地方，出现了一个晦暗的身影……他愤怒地低喘着，绝不放过任何入侵者。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Madrakan Spire
key.uiDescription:
The Maple Alliance has successfully marched into the Madrakan Spire, where everyone now awaits the final showdown against Madria. To clench victory, the Maple Alliance is in dire need of elite heroes. Gather the best fighters you can and put an end to Madrakan!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 马德拉坎尖塔
key.uiDescription: 冒险岛联盟已成功进军至马德拉坎尖塔，与莉莉丝和堕落神龙夜蚀的最终决战一触即发。在这种时候，联盟尤其需要精锐勇士的帮助。召集最精锐的勇士，为马德拉坎之战画上句号吧！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地点复活次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Rock 'n' Rollin' Pink Bean
key.uiDescription:
An unidentifiable, bizarre creature has appeared in the Temple of Time. Protect the temple.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 异界之域
key.uiDescription: 时光神殿里出现了来历不明的奇怪生物。必须对抗异界生物，保卫神殿。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数10人]</font>

key.name: Premium Dungeon
key.uiDescription: A special area for premium club members only! Here you can change into your desired character and break as many statues as you can within the time limit to earn large sums of money.

key.name: 皮皮的秘密仓库
key.uiDescription: 皮皮的隐秘仓库，隐藏在时间之流中！ 他在这里发明了许多物品。这些物品肯定会给冒险岛世界带来大麻烦的。 在皮皮再发明出什么新东西前，教训下他吧！

key.name: Cathy Mart Part-Time Job
key.uiDescription: $npc:11001985$ has a thriving business and is ready to expand! She's recruiting staff for her newly opened express mart. Can you survive the fast-paced low-pay life of an order fulfillment center worker? Gather up a 4-member party and find out!

key.name: Abandoned Mine B1
key.uiDescription:
Rare and precious treasure is hidden in the abandoned mine. Can you find your way through the labyrinthine mine, avoiding the hidden monsters and dangerous traps to find the treasure?
<font color='#00aaef'>• A special key is required to enter the Abandoned Mine.</font>

key.name: Abandoned Mine B4
key.uiDescription:
Rare and precious treasure is hidden in the abandoned mine. Can you find your way through the labyrinthine mine, avoiding the hidden monsters and dangerous traps to find the treasure?
<font color='#00aaef'>• A special key is required to enter the Abandoned Mine.</font>

key.name: Testing Grounds
key.uiDescription: $npcName:21800006$, a good friend of $npcName:11000134$, has created a place where the warriors of Murpagoth can train their wits and their skills. Are you up to the challenge?

key.name: Toxic Garden
key.uiDescription: The old crown said these were tulip seeds. Instead, giant poisonous plants sprouted from the ground, turning the park into a $map:02000328$! It's time to do some weeding.

key.name: Operation Hen Rescue
key.uiDescription: A troop of monkeys has cluck-napped the hens from $map:02000087$ and locked them up in cages! With the cauldron set to boil, there's not much time to save them. Get in there and help those hens fly the coop!

key.name: Twinkling Path
key.uiDescription: The children frolicking in picturesque $map:02000331$ are in danger! They've hidden deep in the forest to avoid the grouchy mage, but they need help getting out. Go find them and help them escape.

key.name: Watchtower Rampart
key.uiDescription: From beyond $map:2000334$, wild pigs have gathered to attack the castle walls. We can't lose a watchtower to a bunch of pigs! Defeat the wild pigs and protect $map:2000334$!

key.name: Dark Descent
key.uiDescription:
Evil lurks in the Dark Descent. Battle your way down to the source of the darkness and vanquish it before it destroys all that is pure and good!
<font color='#00aaef'>• If you forfeit while in the dungeon, you will not earn any points or rewards. Collected Havi fruits are reset roughly every 8 weeks.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge.</font>

key.name: Illusory Pyramid
key.uiDescription: The pyramid has stood silent as a monument to the collapsed Merjit kingdom. But recently, the dead have been rising from their graves in this area. What is causing them to return? The answer must be deep within the pyramid...

key.name: Frozen Temple
key.uiDescription: A mysterious girl has taken up residence in the forgotten temple, and ice has begun to cover the ancient halls. Who is she, and what does she hope to achieve there?

key.name: Labyrinthine Halls
key.uiDescription:
Nazkar Temple was once the home of the dragons known as the Guides of Light. Ages have passed since the dragons vanished, and rumors are swirling that darkness gathers in their absence. What lies within the shadows engulfing Nazkar?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 迷宫集会堂
key.uiDescription: 纳兹卡尔神殿曾是被称为光之向导的群龙的驻留地，经过了漫长的岁月，群龙离开了这里。最近，却有一片巨大的黑暗阴影再次涌来，笼罩着卡尔神殿。这黑暗阴影到底是什么呢？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: 地下迷宫
key.uiDescription: 纳兹卡尔神殿曾是被称为光之向导的群龙的驻留地。经过漫长的岁月，群龙早已离去，然而最近，这里却再次被巨大的黑暗阴影笼罩……这巨大黑影的真面目究竟是什么？ <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font>

key.name: 地下迷宫
key.uiDescription: 纳兹卡尔神殿曾是被称为光之向导的群龙的驻留地。经过漫长的岁月，群龙早已离去，然而最近，这里却再次被巨大的黑暗阴影笼罩……这巨大黑影的真面目究竟是什么？ <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font>

key.name: Duel on the Deck
key.uiDescription:
Captain $npcName:11003582$ is worried that she's out of practice with her swords, so she wants you to spar with her.
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

key.name: Training Yard Tussle
key.uiDescription:
Test your limits by sparring with the Royal Guard's top brass!
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

key.name: Nairin's Combat Simulator
key.uiDescription:
Will you be worthy of the machine power taken to analyze your combat technique? Only Nairin's Combat Simulator can provide the answer!
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

key.name: Trial by Ordeal
key.uiDescription:
A time-honored test of destiny. Can you defeat the Templar and reveal your fate?
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

key.name: Close Quarters
key.uiDescription:
"Kill or be killed." This is training, Schatten-style.
<font color='#00aaef'>Clear Condition: Rank A or Better</font>
<font color='#00aaef'>The challenge ends when your health reaches 0.</font>

key.name: Wrath of Infernog
key.uiDescription:
Infernog, the great immortal monarch has finally awoken. The only way to stop this ancient, immortal balrog is to use the Sky Fortress's ultimate weapon to blast him into outer space.
<font color='#00aaef'>Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>When Infernog descends from his ship, player revival will be restricted.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>Special items are required to fight against Infernog:</font> <font color='#00aaef'>$item:20000762$, $item:20000763$</font> (Sold by the Goods Quartermaster) <font color='#FFD400'>A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Ludibrium Clock Tower
key.uiDescription:
Can you overcome Papulatus, the master of time? Conquer him and you can obtain an item that exists between past and future. Take up the paradox of Papulatus before the rift of Ludibrium closes.
<font color='#FFD400'>• Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: [活动]玩具城钟楼
key.uiDescription: 统治时间次元的时间怪物，帕普拉图斯。 据说只要能突破它的力量，攻克时间缝隙， 就能获得存在于过去和未来之间的特殊道具。 \n<font color='#FFD400'>[在该区域里，比怪物更强大的冒险家的能力值会有所调整]</font> <font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：10人]</font>

key.name: 玩具城钟楼（困难）
key.uiDescription: 统治时间次元的时间怪物，帕普拉图斯。 据说只要能突破它的力量，攻克时间缝隙， 就能获得存在于过去和未来之间的特殊道具。 在玩具城的时空被关闭之前，拿到帕普拉图斯的悖论吧。 \n<font color='#00aaef'>拥有“灵魂歇息” 效果时，无法原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>通关副本后获得等级奖励。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：10人]</font>

key.name: Emerald Prison
key.uiDescription: The power of the Green Lapenta has coalesced in this place, the $map:02020101$. $npcName:23000116$ has taken residence here, where she harvests the lives of all who trespass. Defeat her to return her to her normal self! \n<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 翡翠牢笼
key.uiDescription: 汇聚绿色魔方力量的空间$map:02020101$。 在这里见到的$npcName:23000116$对生命有着诡异的执着，并对来到自己空间的生命垂涎不已。要让她恢复原状只能凭借自己的实力！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>通关副本后，可以获得排名奖励。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数4人]</font>

key.name: Azure Flux
key.uiDescription: The power of the Blue Lapenta has coalesced in this place, the $map:02020111$. $npcName:23000117$ is using the area as a testing ground for his newfound powers. He must be stopped before he sets his eyes on the greater world! \n<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 死亡深蓝
key.uiDescription: 汇聚蓝色魔方力量的空间$map:02020111$。 在这里见到的$npcName:23000117$能够自由自在地变换空间，为了检验自己的新力量，他十分欢迎挑战者来访。能够阻止暴走的$npcName:23000117$，让他恢复原状的人是谁！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>通关副本后，可以获得排名奖励。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数4人]</font>

key.name: Terminus of Time
key.uiDescription: The power of the Red Lapenta has coalesced in this place, the $map:02020120$. $npcName:23000118$ holds dominion over the flow of time here. Survive the chaos of his temporal tyranny and restore him to his true self! \n<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 终结之点
key.uiDescription: 汇聚红色魔方力量的空间$map:02020120$。 在这里见到的$npcName:23000118$能够操纵时间颠倒日月。想让他恢复原状，必须要在不停变化的时间中存活下来！ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>通关副本后，可以获得排名奖励。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数4人]</font>

key.name: Blackshard Nexus
key.uiDescription: $map:02020130$ has become a vortex of unstable lapenta energy. If this build-up isn't stopped, it will be impossible to save Maple World—or the Runeblades who are trapped in the middle of this crisis. \n<font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot instant revive if you have Soul's Respite.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot use Mesos to instant revive.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You will receive a rank reward when the dungeon is cleared.</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: 封印的扎昆神殿
key.uiDescription: <font color='#FFD400'>* 装备点数指引</font> <font color='#00aaef'>武器、上衣、下装</font> : 70级<font color='#c888ff'>卓越</font>等级，精英冒险家装备强化10阶段 <font color='#00aaef'>帽子、手套、鞋子</font> : 70级<font color='#c888ff'>卓越</font>等级，强化10阶段 <font color='#00aaef'>耳环、腰带、披风、项链、戒指</font> : 60级<font color='#c888ff'>卓越</font>等级 恶魔之树扎昆会给献出灵魂的人赐予强大的力量。目前在克里蒂亚斯监测到企图召唤扎昆的动态。$npcName:11004430$企图以部下$npcName:23000301$的灵魂为代价获取力量。靠阻止$npcName:23000301$真能打消$npcName:11004430$的野心吗？ \n<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

key.name: 埃内尔城堡争夺战

key.name: Queen Bean Arena
key.uiDescription: $npcName:11004285$, queen of the Pink Beans, has descended upon Maple World! The $npcName:11004285$ Rumble is a tournament between Maple World's craziest heroes. Can you bring a little excitement to Her Majesty's humdrum life? Clear Condition: Clear Round 1 or higher The challenge ends automatically when your health reaches 0. You must equip the standard weapon type for your job to enter. Your reward is based on how many rounds you cleared. You can't advance to the next round if you don't meet its gear score requirement. Your ranking is recorded after you select 'Start Over.' • Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Rounds 1-3: 19400 Weapon Lv. 70 Epics +13 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Epics +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics Rounds 4-7: 24000 Weapon Lv. 70 Epics +14 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics Rounds 8-10: 24000 Weapon Lv. 70 Legendaries +11 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score.

品克缤们的女王！$npcName:11004285$降临冒险岛世界啦！ 为了让她无聊的日常生活有点乐趣，特地准备了大型活动，$npcName:11004285$大战。究竟谁能击败出战$npcName:11004285$大战的所有选手，博得女王一笑呢！

<font color='#FFD400'>* 第4~7回合装备点数：24000</font> <font color='#00aaef'>武器</font>：70级<font color='#c888ff'>卓越</font>级+14强 <font color='#00aaef'>上装、下装</font>：70级<font color='#ffd533'>传说</font>级+10强 <font color='#00aaef'>帽子、手套、鞋子</font>：70级<font color='#ffd533'>传说</font>级+10强 <font color='#00aaef'>耳环、披风、项链、戒指、腰带</font>：70级<font color='#c888ff'>卓越</font>级
<font color='#FFD400'>* 第8~10回合装备点数：31400</font> <font color='#00aaef'>武器</font>：70级<font color='#ffd533'>传说</font>级+11强 <font color='#00aaef'>上装、下装</font>：70级<font color='#ffd533'>传说</font>级+10强 <font color='#00aaef'>帽子、手套、鞋子</font>：70级<font color='#ffd533'>传说</font>级+10强 <font color='#00aaef'>耳环、披风、项链、戒指、腰带</font>：70级<font color='#c888ff'>卓越</font>级 \n<font color='#00aaef'>达成条件：通关1个回合以上</font> <font color='#00aaef'>必须装备职业推荐武器才能入场。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>生命降到0时自动结束挑战。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>通关回合时，如果未满足下一回合的装备点数条件，则结束挑战，按已通关的回合发放奖励。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>排名与奖励次数无关，只有选中“重玩”时才会记录排名。</font> \n<font color='#FFD400'> [在本场所中，比怪物强大的冒险家的能力值会有相应调整]</font>

<font color='#FFD400'>* 装备点数指引</font> <font color='#00aaef'>武器、上衣、下装</font>：70级<font color='#ffd533'>传说</font>等级，强化13阶段 <font color='#00aaef'>帽子、手套、鞋子</font>：70级<font color='#ff8c37'>史诗</font>等级，强化10阶段 <font color='#00aaef'>耳环、披风、项链、戒指、腰带</font>：70级<font color='#ffd533'>传说</font>等级 
塔兰王国的最新兵器——埃尔凯温。据说这个机器人即将在$npcName:11004683$手中重生……它很可能会成为魔焰之翼军团的最强战斗力。不管有什么困难，都要阻止它！ 
<font color='#00aaef'>需要装备职业推荐武器才能入场。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>“灵魂休眠”效果持续期间无法原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全地区复活的次数有限。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>完成副本时，获得排名奖励。</font> 
<font color='#FFD400'>[建议入场人数：4人]</font>

与$npcName:11004617$的最后决战终于拉开帷幕！ 如果就此退缩，不光克里蒂亚斯，连冒险岛世界恐怕都要落入他的手中。 唯一能从危机中拯救世界的勇士只有你！ 
<font color='#00aaef'>需要装备职业推荐武器才能入场。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>“灵魂休息”效果持续期间无法原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>通关副本后，可以获得排名奖励。</font>

扎根于神圣石巨人山的古代文明虽然早已消逝……但古代人的遗物却时不时以意外的面貌出现在各个地方。从身体到心灵，甚至记忆都完全冰封的<font color='#00aaef'>$npc:23000006$</font>变成了幻影，在等待挑战者的到来。 
<font color='#00aaef'>无法使用金币原地复活。</font> <font color='#00aaef'>在安全场所复活的次数有限。</font>

很久以前，在被巨大的树木环绕的森林$map:02000009$顶端，荷鲁斯曾以为那是个安全的家园，不料贪婪的人类竟入侵该地窃取了它的蛋，使它感到了撕心裂肺的痛苦。变成幻影重现的荷鲁斯，比以往更加愤怒、更加强悍……挑战者能打败它吗？
